testcase.name: Open Search Definition Basics Successful response Given a valid environment -> And I request the open search description document -> Then I should get 200 response code

Open Search Definition Basics Contains correct template hostname Given a valid environment -> And I request the open search description document -> Then it should have a template with this environments hostname
Open Search Definition Basics Template has expected values Given a valid environment -> And I request the open search description document -> Then the values should contain:

Open Search Definition Basics Template url works with blanks Given a valid environment -> And I request the open search description document -> When I make a request to the template url with blanks for optional parameters -> Then I get a valid response with entries

testsuite.name: Template url works with the example values

testcase.name: Open Search Definition Basics Template url works with the example values Given a valid environment -> And I request the open search description document -> When I make a request to the template url with using the example query values -> Then I get a valid response with entries

testsuite.name: Spatial query crossing date time line

testcase.name: Must-not-break search scenarios Spatial query crossing date time line Given a valid environment -> And I request the open search description document -> When I make a request with a date time line crossing bounding box -> Then I get a valid response with entries -> And The entries contain GGD904 -> And The entries contain AE_L2A

testsuite.name: Temporal query with a single day range

testcase.name: Must-not-break search scenarios Temporal query with a single day range Given a valid environment -> And I request the open search description document -> When I make a request with date range "2003-07-02" to "2003-07-02" -> Then I get a valid response with entries -> And The entries don't contain NSIDC-0478 -> And The entries contain NSIDC-0433 -> And The entries contain NSIDC-0051 -> And The entries contain IDBMG4

testsuite.name: Temporal query with a single year range

testcase.name: Must-not-break search scenarios Temporal query with a single year range Given a valid environment -> And I request the open search description document -> When I make a request with date range "1991-01-01" to "1992-01-01" -> Then I get a valid response with entries -> And The entries don't contain GGD648 -> And The entries contain GGD601

Must-not-break search scenarios Text search for glacier Given a valid environment -> And I request the open search description document -> When I perform a text search for "glacier" -> Then The entries contain g01130 in the top 15 -> And The entries contain nsidc-0272 in the top 15

Must-not-break search scenarios Text search for snow cover Given a valid environment -> And I request the open search description document -> When I perform a text search for "snow cover" -> Then The entries contain nsidc-0046 in the top 20 -> And The entries contain mod10a2 in the top 20 -> And The entries contain g02158 in the top 20 -> And The entries contain g02156 in the top 20

testsuite.name: Text search for sea ice concentration

testcase.name: Must-not-break search scenarios Text search for sea ice concentration Given a valid environment -> And I request the open search description document -> When I perform a text search for "sea ice concentration" -> Then The entries contain NSIDC-0051 in the top 15 -> And The entries contain NSIDC-0192 in the top 15 -> And The entries contain NSIDC-0081 in the top 15 -> And The entries contain NSIDC-0079 in the top 15

testsuite.name: Text search for sea ice extent

testcase.name: Must-not-break search scenarios Text search for sea ice extent Given a valid environment -> And I request the open search description document -> When I perform a text search for "sea ice extent" -> Then The entries contain g02186 in the top 15 -> And The entries contain g02135 in the top 15

Must-not-break search scenarios Text search for modis Given a valid environment -> And I request the open search description document -> When I perform a text search for "modis" -> Then The entries don't contain g02186 in the top 5

testsuite.name: Text search for snow cover with a spatial bounding box

testcase.name: Must-not-break search scenarios Text search for snow cover with a spatial bounding box Given a valid environment -> And I request the open search description document -> When I perform a text search for "snow cover" -> And I set the spatial bounding box to "N:-40.0, S:-90.0, E:180.0, W:-180.0" -> Then The entries don't contain nsidc-0046

testsuite.name: Text search for snow cover with temporal Coverage

testcase.name: Must-not-break search scenarios Text search for snow cover with temporal Coverage Given a valid environment -> And I request the open search description document -> When I perform a text search for "snow cover" -> And I make a request with date range 1995-01-01 to 1999-12-31 -> Then The entries don't contain mod10_l2

Must-not-break search scenarios Text search for Joughin Given a valid environment -> And I request the open search description document -> When I perform a text search for "Joughin" -> Then The entries contain nsidc-0523 -> And The entries contain nsidc-0478 -> And The entries contain nsidc-0481

Must-not-break search scenarios Text search for paden Given a valid environment -> And I request the open search description document -> When I perform a text search for "paden" -> Then I get a valid response with 10 entries -> And The entries contain IRKUB1B -> And The entries contain IRMCR1B -> And The entries contain BRMCR1B

Must-not-break search scenarios Text search for LVIS Given a valid environment -> And I request the open search description document -> When I perform a text search for "lvis" -> Then The entries contain ipplv1b -> And The entries contain ilvis2 -> And The entries contain blvis2 -> And The entries contain blvis0 -> And The entries contain ilvis1b
